prefix.name: select databases
prefix.value: Select one or more databases for simple or advanced search

prefix.name: Info line 1
prefix.value: ECOLEX is a database providing the most comprehensive, global source of information on environmental law.

prefix.name: Info line 2
prefix.value: ECOLEX is operated jointly by FAO, IUCN and UNEP.

prefix.name: Info line 3 beg
prefix.value: ECOLEX is currently being updated. Any problems that you may encounter while using the site are likely due to our current work on the database. Please feel free to contact us at
